000004.name: Cotton Aero Polo 240 GSM
000004.desc: Upgrade your look with our Cotton Collar Cuff Tipping Polo, designed for a refined and stylish appeal.
000004.description: Upgrade your look with our Cotton Collar Cuff Tipping Polo, designed for a refined and stylish appeal. Crafted from premium cotton, this polo offers superior comfort, breathability, and durability, while the contrasting tipped collar and cuffs add a touch of sophistication. The 240 GSM weight provides excellent structure and durability, while the super combed cotton ensures a luxuriously soft feel. The distinctive tipped design elements make this polo stand out, perfect for those who want to make a subtle yet stylish statement. Whether for corporate uniforms or personal wear, this polo combines classic style with modern details.
instructions: Machine wash cold with like colors.
When needed, tumble dry low, remove promptly.

000002.name: Cotton Aero Tipping Polo 240 GSM
000002.desc: Crafted for superior strength and long-lasting comfort, our Heavyweight Cotton Polo is designed to withstand everyday wear while offering a premium feel.
000002.description: Crafted for superior strength and long-lasting comfort, our Heavyweight Cotton Polo is designed to withstand everyday wear while offering a premium feel. Made from thick, high-quality cotton, this polo provides exceptional durability, structure, and a polished look for both professional and casual settings. With a premium 280 GSM weight and super combed cotton construction, this polo sets the standard for quality and durability. Perfect for those who demand the best in their workwear or casual attire, this heavyweight polo maintains its shape and appearance even after repeated wear and washing. The substantial fabric weight provides excellent structure while remaining comfortable throughout the day. Available in a range of sizes to fit every body type and with various decoration options to suit your branding needs. Whether you're looking for individual pieces or bulk orders for corporate uniforms, this polo delivers exceptional quality and professional appearance.
instructions: Machine wash cold with like colors.
When needed, tumble dry low, remove promptly.

000008.name: Cotton Pullover Hood 300 GSM
000008.desc: Stay warm and stylish with our Soft Pullover Hoodie, crafted from premium-quality cotton blend for an ultra-soft, cozy feel.
000008.description: Stay warm and stylish with our Soft Pullover Hoodie, crafted from premium-quality cotton blend for an ultra-soft, cozy feel. Designed for maximum comfort and versatility, this hoodie is perfect for casual wear, layering, and branding purposes. The 300 GSM weight provides excellent warmth and durability, while the super combed cotton ensures exceptional softness. The classic pullover design offers timeless style and comfort. Perfect for both individual wear and corporate branding, this hoodie combines style, comfort, and practicality in one premium package.
instructions: Machine wash cold with like colors.
When needed, tumble dry low, remove promptly.

000005.name: Cotton Supersoft Round Neck 180 GSM
000005.desc: Designed for lasting comfort and durability, our Heavy Cotton Round Neck T-Shirt is made from thick, premium-quality cotton.
000005.description: Designed for lasting comfort and durability, our Heavy Cotton Round Neck T-Shirt is made from thick, premium-quality cotton, offering a structured fit and a superior feel. Whether for casual wear, work uniforms, or branding purposes, this t-shirt ensures long-lasting performance without compromising on comfort. The 200 GSM weight provides the perfect balance of durability and comfort, while the bio-washed treatment ensures exceptional softness. The super combed cotton construction adds to the premium quality, making this t-shirt perfect for everyday wear. With its versatile design and superior construction, it's an excellent choice for both individual use and bulk orders.
instructions: Machine wash cold with like colors.
When needed, tumble dry low, remove promptly.

000007.description: Stay warm and stylish with our Soft Zipper Hoodie, crafted from premium-quality cotton blend for an ultra-soft, cozy feel. 000001.name: Double Ply Cotton Pique Polo 280 GSM
000001.desc: Experience luxury with our Supima Cotton Polo, crafted from the world's finest cotton. Renowned for its exceptional softness, durability, and color retention, this polo offers a premium feel and a sophisticated look that lasts.
000001.description: Experience luxury with our Supima Cotton Polo, crafted from the world's finest cotton. This exceptional fabric is not only renowned for its incredible softness but also for its remarkable durability and color retention. Each polo is designed to provide a premium feel that elevates your everyday wardrobe. The Supima Cotton is sourced from the United States, where it is grown under the most ideal conditions, ensuring that only the highest quality fibers are used in our garments. This results in a product that not only looks good but feels good against your skin, making it perfect for all-day wear. The sophisticated look of this polo makes it versatile enough to be dressed up for a business casual setting or dressed down for a relaxed weekend outing. With its tailored fit and elegant design, it flatters a variety of body types, ensuring that you look your best no matter the occasion. The polo is available in a range of classic colors, allowing you to choose the perfect shade to match your personal style. Whether you prefer a timeless black, a crisp white, or a bold navy, there's a color for everyone. Additionally, the polo features a breathable fabric that helps regulate your body temperature, making it comfortable to wear in both warm and cool weather. This makes it an ideal choice for layering under a jacket or wearing on its own. The attention to detail in the stitching and finishing of the polo ensures that it maintains its shape and quality wash after wash. You can trust that this polo will remain a staple in your wardrobe for years to come. Plus, with easy care instructions, you can machine wash it with like colors and tumble dry low, making it as practical as it is stylish. Experience the difference of Supima Cotton and elevate your wardrobe with this luxurious polo that combines comfort, style, and durability in one exceptional piece.
instructions: Machine wash cold with like colors.
When needed, tumble dry low, remove promptly.

000009.name: Dry-fit AeroTech Polo 200 GSM
000009.desc: Designed for performance and style, our Dry Fit Pique Performance Polo offers superior breathability and moisture-wicking technology.
000009.description: Designed for performance and style, our Dry Fit Pique Performance Polo offers superior breathability, moisture-wicking technology, and all-day comfort. Made from high-quality pique fabric, this polo keeps you cool, dry, and fresh, making it perfect for sports, corporate wear, and active lifestyles. The 200 GSM weight provides excellent durability while maintaining breathability, and the UV protection feature adds an extra layer of functionality. The Super Wick technology ensures moisture management for optimal comfort during activities. Whether for sports teams, corporate uniforms, or individual wear, this performance polo delivers both style and functionality.
000009.image_alt: Premium Dry Fit Pique Performance Polo
instructions: Machine wash cold with like colors.
When needed, tumble dry low, remove promptly.

000003.name: Poly Cotton Fusion Polo 220 GSM
000003.desc: A balanced blend of comfort and durability, our Poly Cotton Fusion Polo is ideal for uniforms and daily wear.
000003.description: A balanced blend of comfort and durability, our Poly Cotton Fusion Polo is designed for all-day performance in professional and casual environments. The poly cotton construction offers better shape retention, color hold, and easy maintenance, while still feeling soft and breathable on skin. With a sturdy 220 GSM fabric weight, this polo delivers a clean, structured fit suitable for teams, events, and corporate uniforms. It is built to handle repeated use and washing without losing its polished appearance.
instructions: Machine wash cold with like colors.
When needed, tumble dry low, remove promptly.

000006.name: Supima Supersoft Cotton Polo 240 GSM
000006.desc: Made with premium Supima cotton, this supersoft polo delivers exceptional comfort, strength, and a refined finish.
000006.description: Made with premium Supima cotton, this supersoft polo is crafted for customers who want luxury feel with long-term durability. Supima fibers are longer and stronger than regular cotton, helping the fabric stay smooth, soft, and rich in color even after repeated wash cycles. At 240 GSM, the polo provides a premium structure without compromising breathability. It is ideal for high-end uniforms, executive branding, and elevated everyday styling.
instructions: Machine wash cold with like colors.
When needed, tumble dry low, remove promptly.
